resources.string: Removes an unjustified \"Unauthorized device\" message of HTC Sense apps on legal HTC devices.
Enable to say HTC apps that your device has an external storage.
Enable to say HTC apps that your device supports USB storage (USB-OTG).
Use Themes for default Material apps
Material apps without own brand colors will be tinted according to current HTC Theme.
Color to use for Android\'s notification panel header.\nSet the last color of the dialog to use your Theme\'s color.
Color to use for Android\'s quick settings. \nSet the last color of the dialog to use your Theme\'s color.
